html:
Dec 8 (Reuters) - OPONTIA:

  • OPONTIA ANNOUNCED IT HAS RAISED $42M

  • THE SERIES A INVESTMENT ROUND IS A MIX OF EQUITY AND VENTURE DEBT FINANCING

  • STV, THE LARGEST VENTURE CAPITAL FUND IN THE MIDDLE EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, IS THE LEAD EQUITY INVESTOR

  • SOLIDIFYING THE ROBUST GROWTH POTENTIAL OF OPONTIA IS THE VENTURE DEBT RAISING, WHICH COMPRISES JUST OVER 50% OF THE $42M SERIES A ROUND

  • OPONTIA WILL USE THE FUNDS TO ACQUIRE EXCEPTIONAL E-COMMERCE BRANDS AND TO INVEST IN A TEAM OF EXPERIENCED E-COMMERCE EXPERTS IN CENTRAL AND EASTERN EUROPE, THE MIDDLE EAST AND AFRICA WHO WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR MANAGING AND GROWING BRANDS AFTER ACQUISITION

  • COMPANY HAS ALREADY RECRUITED A TOP-TIER TEAM WITH NOTABLE EXPERIENCE FROM AMAZON, NOON, MCKINSEY, UBER EATS AND NAMSHI


(( Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com ;))
